languages.text: "Человек-без-сердца получал удовольствие. Его труд должен был быть {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Fanatic}святой миссией служения{/d}. Боль тысяч должна была быть сакральной жертвой. Но он получал наслаждение от нее. Это было... мерзко".

traits.locale_text: "Человек-без-сердца называл свои опыты великой миссией, но на деле получал удовольствие от мучений пациентов и упопших. Их жертва должна была стать спасением тысяч. А не служить наслаждением одному извращенному разуму".

languages.text: "The Heartless Man enjoyed what he did. His work should have been a {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Fanatic}holy mission of service{/d}. The pain of thousands should have been a solemn sacrifice. Yet he derived pleasure from it. It was... repulsive."
languages.original_text: "Человек-без-сердца получал удовольствие. Его труд должен был быть {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Fanatic}святой миссией служения{/d}. Боль тысяч должна была быть сакральной жертвой. Но он получал наслаждение от нее. Это было... мерзко".

traits.locale_text: "The Heartless One enjoyed doing what he did. His work should have been a holy mission of service. The pain of thousands should have been a solemn sacrifice. Yet he derived pleasure from it. It was... repulsive."

"The Heartless Man enjoyed what he did. His work should have been a {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Fanatic}holy mission of service{/d}. The pain of thousands should have been a solemn sacrifice. Yet he derived pleasure from it. It was... repulsive."

languages.text: « Le Sans-Cœur aimait beaucoup ce qu'il faisait. Sa mission sacrée aurait dû consister à {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Fanatic}servir{/d}, et rien d'autre. La souffrance de la multitude aurait dû être un sacrifice solennel. Et pourtant, il en a tiré du plaisir. C'était... répugnant. »
languages.original_text: "The Heartless Man enjoyed what he did. His work should have been a {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Fanatic}holy mission of service{/d}. The pain of thousands should have been a solemn sacrifice. Yet he derived pleasure from it. It was... repulsive."

traits.locale_text: « Le Sans-Cœur aimait beaucoup ce qu'il faisait. Sa mission sacrée aurait dû consister à {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Fanatic}servir{/d}, et rien d'autre. La souffrance de la multitude aurait dû être un sacrifice solennel. Et pourtant, il en a tiré du plaisir. C'était... répugnant. »

languages.text: «El Despiadado disfrutaba con su labor. Su trabajo debería haber sido una {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Fanatic}sagrada misión de servicio{/d}. El dolor de miles debería haber sido un sacrificio solemne. Pero le resultaba placentero. Era... repugnante».
languages.original_text: "The Heartless Man enjoyed what he did. His work should have been a {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Fanatic}holy mission of service{/d}. The pain of thousands should have been a solemn sacrifice. Yet he derived pleasure from it. It was... repulsive."

traits.locale_text: «El despiadado disfrutaba con su labor. Su trabajo debería haber sido una {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Fanatic}sagrada misión de servicio{/d}. El dolor de miles debería haber sido un sacrificio solemne. Pero le resultaba placentero. Era... repugnante».

languages.text: 「無情なる男はその行為を楽しんでいた。彼の仕事は{d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Fanatic}仕えるという神聖な使命{/d}であるべきだわ。何千人もの苦しみは過酷な犠牲であるべきよ。でも、彼はそれを喜びにしていた。そんなの…反吐が出る」
languages.original_text: "The Heartless Man enjoyed what he did. His work should have been a {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Fanatic}holy mission of service{/d}. The pain of thousands should have been a solemn sacrifice. Yet he derived pleasure from it. It was... repulsive."

traits.locale_text: 「無情なる者はその行為を楽しんでいた。彼の仕事は{d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Fanatic}仕えるという神聖な使命{/d}であるべきだわ。何千人もの苦しみは過酷な犠牲であるべきよ。でも、彼はそれを喜びにしていた。そんなの…反吐が出る」

languages.text: “无心者很享受他所做的一切。他的工作本该是{d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Fanatic}神圣的侍奉{/d}，数千人的痛苦本该是庄严的牺牲，可他却从中获得了乐趣。这实在是……令人厌恶。”
languages.original_text: "The Heartless Man enjoyed what he did. His work should have been a {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Fanatic}holy mission of service{/d}. The pain of thousands should have been a solemn sacrifice. Yet he derived pleasure from it. It was... repulsive."

traits.locale_text: “无心者很享受他所做的一切。他的工作本该是{d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Fanatic}神圣的侍奉{/d}，而数千人的痛苦本该是庄严的牺牲，可他却从中获得了乐趣。这实在是……令人厌恶。”

languages.text: "Der herzlose Mann genoss, was er tat. Seine Arbeit hätte eine {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Fanatic}heilige Dienstmission{/d} sein sollen. Der Schmerz Tausender hätte ein ernstes Opfer sein sollen. Doch er bezog daraus Vergnügen. Es war ... abstoßend."
languages.original_text: "The Heartless Man enjoyed what he did. His work should have been a {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Fanatic}holy mission of service{/d}. The pain of thousands should have been a solemn sacrifice. Yet he derived pleasure from it. It was... repulsive."

traits.locale_text: "Der Herzlose genoss, was er tat. Seine Arbeit hätte eine {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Fanatic}heilige Dienstmission{/d} sein sollen. Der Schmerz Tausender hätte ein ernstes Opfer sein sollen. Doch er bezog daraus Vergnügen. Es war ... abstoßend."

languages.text: "Kalpsiz Adam, yaptığından keyif alıyordu. İşinin {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Fanatic}kutsal bir hizmet misyonu{/d} olması gerekiyordu. Binlerce insanın çektiği acı, dinî bir kurbanlık vazifesi olmalıydı. Ancak o, bundan keyif aldı. Bu yaptığı... İğrençti."
languages.original_text: "The Heartless Man enjoyed what he did. His work should have been a {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Fanatic}holy mission of service{/d}. The pain of thousands should have been a solemn sacrifice. Yet he derived pleasure from it. It was... repulsive."
